title: Michael Zeiton's Trendromeda Strain 3/3: Reese's. Kings of Leon, Neera Tanden, Neanderthals
itunes:title: Michael Zeiton's Trendromeda Strain 3/3: Reese's. Kings of Leon, Neera Tanden, Neanderthals
description:
On this edition of Michael Zeiton Jack and Miles discuss the new All Peanut Butter Reese's, Kings of Leon are releasing their next album as an NFT, Neera has withdrawn her name from consideration for Budget Chief, and Joe Biden referred to lifting mask restrictions as "Neanderthal Thinking" and you can guess how that's going with Republicans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
